channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump links Thailand, Cambodia trade deals to ceasefire
item.description: President Trump on Saturday said no trade deals would be struck with Thailand and Cambodia until they cease fighting.

item.title: Paramount, Skydance merger set for August; deal worth $8 billion
item.description: Paramount Global and Skydance Media announced Friday that their merger will take place next month, barring any issues with the $8 billion deal.

item.title: Official fired during Trump's first term appointed president of embattled U.S. Institute of Peace

item.title: House could be forced to vote on releasing Epstein files in September
item.description: A rogue effort to force a House vote directing the Department of Justice to release its files from the Jeffrey Epstein case is likely to succeed when ...

item.title: Ex-CIA analysts say former Obama officials' actions serve another blow to U.S. intel agencies
item.description: The intelligence community is taking another blow to its credibility, former CIA analysts say, after newly released declassified material alleges that...

item.title: Illegal Alien Felons Won’t Get Taxpayer-Funded Legal Aid in California, and Activists are Fuming
item.description: In a minor positive step, California ends state-funded legal aid for illegal aliens with felony convictions. The radical groups getting paid to defend...

item.title: Louisville Revises Sanctuary Policies: Early Indicator of Growing Trend?

item.title: Trump is under water on some of his top issues — including immigration, poll shows
item.description: The president’s approval rating had been ticking upward since its biggest drop in April.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
